section.heading: Judicial review of Mayor’s decision.
section.text: Any person aggrieved by a decision of the Mayor, or as to whose claim the Mayor has failed to hold a hearing within a reasonable time pursuant to § 41-125(a), may have such claim reviewed pursuant to § 2-510.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 26 of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act).
